markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with RDC | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = Bounty - Radulf | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_RDC_01 | guid = a4933927-8f49-4631-9eaa-2b7496d2381e }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Wakoyo has tasked the Watcher with hunting down Assila Wave-Skipper, a Príncipi captain in command of the voyager River Dragon. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Simple. Head south of Port Maje, find [Assila Wave-Skipper](/assilaWaveSkipper/) on her ship ''[The River Dragon](/theRiverDragon/)'', and deal with it. Return to Wakoyo for your reward. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_RDC_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Assila Wave-Skipper''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Fleet Master Wakoyo has tasked me with hunting down Assila Wave-Skipper, a Príncipi captain in command of the voyager River Dragon. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Assila Wave-Skipper and take her ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Assila Wave-Skipper commands the voyager River Dragon and sails the waters around a group of islands to the southwest of Port Maje. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Fleet Master Wakoyo in the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Assila Wave-Skipper's bounty is mine to claim. I can return to Wakayo at the Brass Citadel in Neketaka and receive my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Assila Wave-Skipper and claimed the reward for her bounty. |- | style="text-align:center" | - | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | |}
